summary: Five students on spring break meet at a secluded island cabin for a weekend getaway. After a night of music, drinking and getting re-acquainted the five friends are shocked to find the cabin's caretaker murdered and the only boat off the island gone. Stranded on the island they become the prey of a mysterious killer who seems bent on revenge for something the friends have done. They must defend ... See full summary »
cast: Aaron Ashmore|Haylie Duff|Lucy Hale|Kyle Schmid|Anne Marie DeLuise|Martin Cummins|Jacob Blair|Jessica Harmon|Jim Thorburn|Brenna O'Brien|Keith Martin Gordey|Patricia Harras|Rob Morton|Dax Belanger|Dana McLoughlin
title: La isla del miedo
